value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query

value.title: Exception Reporting in Power BI Catch the Error Rows in Power Query

If you build a reporting solution that the refresh of that fails everytime an error occurs, it is not a robust system. Errors can happen by many reasons, In this video, I‚Äôll show you a way to catch potential errors
